p: Furthermore, because of the presence of two genetically and antigenically distinct type B IVs lineages, co-circulating in the same season with different intensity, it was very difficult to predict the type of virus that will circulate in the following season. During the study period, a complete mismatch between the type B IVs circulating and the vaccine strain, was observed in three consecutive seasons with a high number of cases and positive samples in children, young adults and elderly.
